Name: Form.Uploader
Desc: File upload component with drag and drop functionality
LongDesc: The Uploader component provides a file upload interface with drag and drop support, file previews, and multiple file selection. It is implemented using only div elements and supports change events and disabling.
Example: var uploader = Q.Form.Uploader({ fileTypes: '.jpg,.png', preview: true }); uploader.change(function(files) { console.log(files); });
